subject: Officiating (Sports)
Decisions and Verdicts
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Two co-defendants of Tim Donaghy were sentenced Thursday, and legal experts said their sentences indicated that Donaghy was likely to face a stiff punishment.
snippet: Two co-defendants of Tim Donaghy were sentenced Thursday, and legal experts said their sentences indicated that Donaghy was likely to face a stiff punishment.
